Title: Requires the installation and periodic inspection of water detector alarms in residential dwellings and certain commercial buildings
Summary: Requires the installation and periodic inspection of water detector alarms in residential dwellings and certain commercial buildings; defines a "water detector alarm" as an electronic device that detects the presence of water and sets off an audible and visual alarm when its sensors are triggered; defines a "commercial building" as a building in which individuals are employed.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring the installation and periodic inspection of water detector alarms in residential dwellings and certain commercial buildings
